column1: Section:SW-Reporting and Business Intelligence, Extract, Transform and Load Tools (12 Reqs)

column4: Support ability to develop automated extract and load routines using Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) components.
Support creation of new routines to transform data.
Utilize scripting or other object-oriented structured languages to define advanced transformation routines/procedures.
Support validation and handling of exceptions during transformation.
Provide a graphical environment to model the logical ETL process.
Provide the capability to specify chained transformations on the data flow and apply complex scripted transformations to the data.
Provide the ability to override the default source mapping and use specific SQL statements.
Provide the ability to map data from multiple source systems into multiple target source systems.
Provide the ability to change transformation output data in debug mode.
Provide the ability to define and alter data refresh frequency and methodology according to business needs.
Provide the ability to schedule and monitor the extraction, cleansing, transformation, and loading processes.
Provide the ability to perform incremental loads so as to load only data which has changed since the last update.
